content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) connected to:
  - Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5)
  - Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
  - Iron Chest at position (-15.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) connected to:
  - Iron Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Storage and Processing Facility at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) connected to:
  - Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
  - Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
  - Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) connected to:
  - Iron Chest at position (44.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chests at positions (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters with insufficient fuel
- Ensure that all inserters have sufficient fuel before attempting to use them. Regularly check and refuel inserters to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly check the inventory status of chests and clear them when full to prevent halting of mining operations. Ensure that there is enough storage capacity for mined resources.

### Errors when furnaces lack ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of ingredients to maintain production. Monitor the input inventory of furnaces and replenish as necessary.

### Errors when mining drills are out of resources
- Ensure that mining drills have access to sufficient resources. Regularly check the resource availability in the mining area and relocate drills if necessary.
